overview: This period story is set in the late 1800's - Victorian Europe. Straight out of “Oliver Twist”, we get an inside look at a boarding house that doubles as a training center for young thieves. The guys are taught the art of becoming expert pickpockets as well as expert cocksuckers and butt fuckers. With 13 hot, nasty young bucks in 7 sex scenes, this fantasy sexfest is the way Charles DICK-INs might have written it. Watch these horny teens fuck and suck with abandon.
title: Kleine Strolche
